word.describe: to be real; to be present in a place or situation
linking verb used when you are naming people or things, describing them or giving more information about them
create something, to make something happen or exist
​animate something, to make something more lively or full of energy
to have your home in a particular place
to continue to live or exist
money that employees receive for doing their job, especially professional employees or people working in an office, usually paid every month
to stop living

word.vn: suy tàn, suy sụp, sa sút
word.describe: the process or result of being destroyed by natural causes or by not being cared for (= of decaying)
to be destroyed gradually after death by natural processes
to decay, or make something decay, naturally and gradually
to continue to live or exist
to continue to live or exist
not dead
to have your home in a particular place
to make something more lively or full of energy
no longer alive
connected with or happening at the time of somebody’s death
the ability to breathe, grow, produce young, etc. that people, animals and plants have before they die and that objects do not have
the state or fact of being real or living or of being present
the act or process of making something that is new, or of causing something to exist that did not exist before
the process of making films, videos and computer games in which drawings, models or images of people and animals seem to move
the time when a baby is born; the process of being born
the birth of Jesus Christ, celebrated by Christians at Christmas
the fact of somebody dying or being killed
the state of being human and not living forever
the process or result of being destroyed by natural causes or by not being cared for (= of decaying)

word.vn: sự phân hủy, sự thối rữa
word.describe: the process of being destroyed gradually after death by natural processes
he process or state of decaying and falling apart
the state of continuing to live or exist, often despite difficulty or danger
a person who continues to live, especially despite being nearly killed or experiencing great danger or difficulty
to be able to accept and deal with something unpleasant
to make things to be sold, especially in large quantities
to put somebody/something in a particular position, especially when it is done gently or carefully
(of fish, frogs, etc.) to lay eggs
(of a young bird, fish, insect, etc.) to come out of an egg
used only in the passive, without by
a recently born child or animal
not yet born
having a natural ability or skill for a particular activity or job
​an inborn quality is one that you are born with
(of a quality, feeling, etc.) that you have when you are born
​inherent (in somebody/something) that is a basic or permanent part of somebody/something and that cannot be removed
existing in nature; not made or caused by humans
​(of a disease or medical condition) existing since or before birth
to make somebody/something die
slay somebody/something (old-fashioned or literary) to kill somebody/something in a war or a fight
the crime of killing somebody deliberately
assassinate somebody to murder an important or famous person, especially for political reasons
a person whose job is cutting up and selling meat in a shop or killing animals for this purpose
​the killing of animals for their meat
the killing of a large number of people especially in a cruel way
to remove or get rid of something
liquidate (something) to close a business and sell everything it owns in order to pay debts
to kill somebody/yourself
to kill somebody/yourself
to murder somebody
causing or likely to cause death
causing or ending in death
causing or able to cause death
that cannot live forever and must die
like a dead person; suggesting death
lasting forever
​that lives or lasts forever
to make somebody/something die
an act of killing somebody deliberately
​the killing of animals for their meat
the violent killing of a large number of people
cruel, violent and unnecessary killing
the killing of a large number of people especially in a cruel way
the crime of killing somebody deliberately
the state of being male or female
the fact of being male or female, especially when considered with reference to social and cultural differences, rather than differences in biology; members of a particular gender as a group
connected with the physical activity of sex
being a man or boy
having the qualities or appearance considered to be typical of men; connected with or like men
being a woman or a girl
having the qualities or appearance considered to be typical of women; connected with women
(in some languages) belonging to a class of nouns, pronouns, adjectives or verbs whose gender is not feminine or masculine
a friend
copulate (with somebody/something) to have sex
reproduce something to make a copy of a picture, piece of text, etc.
(of animals) to have sex and produce young
to examine an animal in order to find out whether it is male or female
(formal) the physical activity of sex, usually describing the act of a man putting his penis inside a woman’s vagina
​sex between animals
​the act of having sex
the act or process of producing babies, young animals or plants
(= the physical activity of sex)
​the keeping of animals in order to breed (= produce young) from them
​the period of a person’s life during which their sexual organs develop and they become capable of having children
​the process or time of menstruating
​the time during which a woman gradually stops menstruating, usually at around the age of 50
(of land or soil) that plants grow well in
​able to produce a lot of children, crops, etc.
(of land or soil) not good enough for plants to grow on it
(of humans or animals) not able to produce children or young animals
​having no power to change things or to influence a situation

word.vn: làm mất khả năng sinh đẻ
chó dò thú, chó đánh hơi
chó săn biết nhặt thú về
một loại thú biển ăn cá
một loại thú như hải cẩu
rắn Châu Phi sống ở cây
cá biển nhỏ màu xám bạc
hàm dưới; càng bọ cánh cứng
lớp đất mặt đầy rễ cỏ
cây cọ, cây họ cau, dừa
nho đen Hy lạp, lý chua
quả đỏ giống quả mâm xôi
